title: [AUDIT FOLLOW-UP] Complete Folder/Volume Sync to Notion
description:
Follow-up from Cursor MM1 Work Audit conducted on 2026-01-13.

The original task to sync folders and volumes to Notion databases was NOT completed. Scripts were created but never executed.

deficiencies_identified: DEF-001: Primary User Request Not Fulfilled - Folder/volume sync never executed
DEF-002: Missing Prerequisite - VOLUMES_DATABASE_ID not found/created
DEF-003: Script sync ran in validate-only mode

required_actions.details: Create new database named 'Volumes' with properties: Name (title), Device (rich_text), Filesystem Type (rich_text). Add relation to Folders database.
Run the script and verify folders and volumes appear in Notion databases
Query Notion databases to confirm data was synced successfully

acceptance_criteria: Volumes database exists in Notion with correct properties
FOLDERS_DATABASE_ID and VOLUMES_DATABASE_ID are set in .env
Folders database contains folder entries with Volume relations
